content.raw:
A link to the roadmap would be best (I'm working on this, and a link will be forthcoming). This will be a work in progress for as long as we have funding. A user will only find this project useful if it has the features they need. 

I don't think it's a good idea to drive people away with an "under construction" notification.

A link to the roadmap would be best (I'm working on this, and a link will be forthcoming). This will be a work in progress for as long as we have funding. A user will only find this project useful if it has the features they need.

I don't think it's a good idea to drive people away with an "under construction" notification.
